title: Diagnostic Tests and Products
description: Knowledge base of diagnostic tests and products for autism-related biomarkers, gut health, genomics, and metabolic health

tests.name: tinyhealth baby gut health test
tests.purpose: Microbiome test measuring biomarkers associated with eczema, allergies, asthma, metabolic health, sleep, constipation and more
tests.description: At-home microbiome test with health coaching sessions for kids ages 3 to 18 years

tests.name: tinyhealth child gut health test
tests.purpose: Microbiome test measuring biomarkers associated with eczema, allergies, asthma, metabolic health, sleep, constipation and more
tests.description: At-home microbiome test with health coaching sessions for babies under 3 years of age

tests.name: Intellxx DNA test
tests.purpose: Precision genomics helps pinpoint root-cause SNPs and treatment pathsâ€”guided by a genomics expert
tests.description: At-home DNA swab kit and custom report focused on pinpointing root causes and identifying treatment paths based on precision genomics

tests.name: FRAT now
tests.purpose: Detect autoantibodies and identify folate transport issues
tests.description: Blood test that detects autoantibodies against the folate receptor alpha, which can interfere with folate transport into the brain; results can guide treatment (e.g., alternative folate forms)
